Subject: 'Con Plans
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Shockwave:



Shockwave looked to Hell Beast with his single yellow optic that looks like a 
simple circular light in the middle of his oddly shaped head. 

 "Hell Beast," he intoned, "I suggest we begin preparing to leave this palace 
of ice.  When we find our new base we will want to get it quickly so we are 
not attacked by any possible enemies.  But do not concern yourself with 
finding the base, only with preparing to move out."
